Package com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game

Class PreTeamSelectionEvent

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.event.Event
com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game.GameEvent
com.github.yeetmanlord.bedwars_zeta.api.api_event_hooks.game.PreTeamSelectionEvent
public class PreTeamSelectionEvent extends GameEvent
Fires before teams are selected. This allows you to override the default team selection. This could be used to pair players with friends or party-members. Use setOverrideDefault(boolean) to indicate that this has been done. Ensure that you also remove those players from the available player pool. using removePlayer(BedwarsPlayer).
